author: mandrenguyen
body:
First of several 93X -> 92X backports.
There will shortly be a pilot run of XeXe collisions, which may require us to use the heavy-ion reconstruction sequence for prompt reco. 
The Phase I version of the HI reco has some updated that went into 93X, but not 92X, hence the backporting.
title: Backport of PR #19089 to 92X
